original_text: During the night, Abram separated his men into two groups. Then they attacked Kedorlaomer and his men who had taken Lot. Those men ran away and Abram followed them as far as Hobah. Hobah is north of Damascus.
korean_text: 그와 그의 가신들이 나뉘어 밤에 그들을 쳐부수고 다메섹 왼편 호바까지 쫓아가

sentences.original_text: Abram separated his men into two groups
sentences.korean_translation: 아브람은 그의 사람들을 두 그룹으로 나누었습니다

sentences.original_text: Then they attacked Kedorlaomer and his men
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그들르로메르와 그의 사람들을 공격했습니다

sentences.original_text: and Abram followed them as far as Hobah
